page.title: 03THE SILO UNIT,TWYFORD CONT.
page.content: {THE FACTORY} IS HOUSED IN LAND ADJACENT TO THE RIVER CHERWELL,AS IS THE STORE.THE ADMINISTRATIVE HEADQUARTERS ARE SITUATED AT THE FORMER KINGS SUTTON LODGE,WHICH HAS BEEN ADAPTED TO GIVE AN OFFICE COMPLEX. 60 PERSONS ARE EMPLOYED IN THE SILO. 26 PERSONS ARE EMPLOYED IN THE OFFICES. {THE OPERATIONS}(1)PRODUCTION OF COMPONENTS FOR ANIMAL FEED MANUFACTURES (2)STORAGE OF EEC AND OTHER GRAIN. (3)SUPPLY OF TEMPORARY BUILDINGS TO STORE GRAIN IN OVERSEAS LOCATIONS. (1)THERE ARE FOUR MAIN PRODUCTS SOYA PELLTS,PARTIALLY DRIED GRASS PELLETS, PROCESSED MAIZE AND CHERCO,WHICH IS A COMPOUND MADE FROM COFFEE WASTE PRODUCTS.(2)AT PRESENT 200,000 TONNES ARE STORED.THE SILOS WILL PROTECT FROM DAMP CONDITIONS AND INSECT PESTS.SOME NONE EEC GRAIN AND OTHER PRODUCTS ARE ALSO STORED.
